definition: to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb

sentences.english: The destruction of epoxy bonded joint in HCI solution was more serious than that in H2SO4 solution.
sentences.chinese: 鹽酸溶液對環氧膠接接頭的破壞作用要比硫酸溶液強。
